Primary Contact: Jeremy McCall, Executive Director, Outdoor Recreation Council of British Columbia; Email: jeremymccall@orcbc.ca
Service Details: - Promotes the benefits of public outdoor recreation- Represents the interests of the outdoor recreation community to government, industry and the public- Advocates and facilitates access to public lands and waters for outdoor recreation- Fosters responsible use of BC's outdoors by recreational users through advocacy and education- Acts as a forum for the exchange of views between government, outdoor recreation groups and other organizations in matters related to outdoor recreation- Builds bridges between outdoor recreation groups
Meetings: Annual General Meeting is held in June at various locations
